title: Protect Your WordPress Forms from Spam with WP Armour – Honeypot Anti Spam
content:
Spam submissions on WordPress forms are a common problem, but there’s a way to stop them without the hassle of Captchas or additional verification steps. Enter the WP Armour – Honeypot Anti Spam Plugin. Using the honeypot technique, this plugin ensures that only human users can submit forms, while bots are left out in the cold. Let’s take a deeper look at how this plugin works and how it can save you from unwanted spam.

What is Honeypot Anti-Spam?

The honeypot anti-spam technique is an effective, unobtrusive way to block spam bots. Unlike traditional Captchas, which ask users to solve puzzles or enter text from distorted images, the honeypot method involves adding an invisible field to a form that bots will fill out, but humans won’t even see. If this field is filled out, the form is automatically flagged as a spam submission.

Key Features of WP Armour – Honeypot Anti Spam

WP Armour uses this method to protect a variety of forms across your WordPress site, including but not limited to:

  • Comments

  • User Registration

  • Contact Form 7

  • Gravity Forms

  • WPForms

  • BBPress Forum

  • WooCommerce Reviews

  • GDPR Compliant

This plugin doesn’t require any setup. Once activated, it automatically enables the honeypot field on supported forms, meaning you don’t have to worry about configuring anything manually.

How WP Armour Stands Out

Here’s why WP Armour is unique compared to other honeypot anti-spam plugins:

  • No External API Calls: Unlike Akismet or CleanTalk, WP Armour doesn’t rely on external APIs or monthly subscriptions to filter spam. Everything runs on your server.

  • Works on Most Forms and WordPress Systems: WP Armour is compatible with not only forms like contact forms but also WordPress registration and comment forms.

  • GDPR Compliant: No tracking, no cookie storage, and no external server calls are involved.

  • Automatic Protection: The plugin activates immediately without any configuration needed and protects forms from the moment it’s installed.

  • Unique Honeypot Fields: Each WordPress installation generates a unique honeypot field name, making it nearly impossible for bots to target.

WP Armour Extended – Premium Features

While the free version offers great protection, the WP Armour Extended (Paid Version) takes it to the next level with additional features:

  • Record and view spam submissions: You can check the details of spam attempts and see what bots are trying to submit.

  • Block spam bot IPs: Multiple spam submissions from the same IP can trigger an automatic block.

  • Advanced IP-based anti-spam filters: Add another layer of protection by filtering based on IP addresses.

No API or Monthly Subscription

One of the best aspects of WP Armour is that you won’t need to pay for a monthly subscription or rely on an API. The plugin does its job out-of-the-box. The paid version is available for additional features, but even the free version offers robust protection.

How to Install WP Armour

To install WP Armour, simply follow these steps:

  1. Go to your WordPress dashboard.

  2. Navigate to Plugins > Add New.

  3. Search for “WP Armour – Honeypot Anti Spam”.

  4. Install and activate the plugin.

Once activated, you’ll see the plugin appear in your settings. From here, you can customize the honeypot field name and error messages, if desired.

Conclusion

Spam can be a major nuisance for site administrators, but WP Armour’s honeypot anti-spam method provides a seamless, no-hassle way to keep your forms safe from bots. It’s easy to install, requires no additional subscriptions, and works on a wide variety of WordPress forms. Try it out today and say goodbye to spam!
